text:
1. Page Title: Raskolnikov's Encounter

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Raskolnikov in a crowded tavern, anxious.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: Why am I drawn to others now? 
       • Raskolnikov: I need to escape this gloom.

   - Panel 2 — Setup: A retired clerk stares intensely at Raskolnikov.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Clerk: (thinking) Who is this young man?
       • Clerk: (smirking) He seems out of place.

3. Layout: staggered

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is struck by the peculiar presence of a retired clerk in a tavern, who exudes a mix of intelligence and madness despite his disheveled appearance.
